gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
TO-INF

sense.def:
Z besedo
to claim
povemo, kaj je nekdo rekel, kadar nismo prepričani, da je tisto res.

seg.quote: He claimed that he found the money in the forest.
They claimed to have shot down twenty-two planes.

sense.def:
A claim
je tisto, kar nekdo reče, ne more pa dokazati in morda tudi ni resnično.

seg.quote: Forecasts do not support the government's claim that the economy is picking up.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
claims responsibility or credit for something
, pravi, da je za nekaj odgovoren ali zaslužen.

seg.quote: The rebels claimed responsibility for the bombing.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
claims something
, na primer denar ali imetje, prosi za tisto, ker je to njegova pravica.

seg.quote: Voluntary workers can claim travelling expenses.
Don't forget to claim for a first-class rail ticket to London.

sense.def:
A claim
je tudi zahteva po nečem, do česar imamo po svojem mnenju pravico.

seg.quote: The wave of bombings and street clashes is claiming new lives every day.

sense.def:
Če ima človek
a claim on someone
, ima pravico, da od nekoga nekaj zahteva.

seg.quote: She realized that she had no claims on the man.

sense.def:
To lay claim to something
pomeni reči, da je nekaj naše;
